abstract.title: ABSTRACT
abstract.p: We report the complete genome sequence of Paenibacillus sp. strain 37, a plant growth-promoting bacterium (PGPB) isolated from the rhizosphere of Abies nordmanniana (Stev.) Spach; it contains a single chromosome of 7.08 Mbp and one plasmid of 54.33 kbp, including 6,445 protein-coding genes, 107 tRNAs, and 13 rRNA loci.
